ending-1: You finished your shift. The next day you are awoken by a news report on the radio. A series of drive-by shootings have occurred at polling places across Angel City, in areas that are majority pro-secession. You are fired from your job for negligence. It is cold outside and you won't be able to make rent
ending-2: You finished your shift. The next day you are awoken by a news report on the radio. A bomb was detonated by anti-secession protestors
